item.title: FTNT
item.description: score:89 Chances: Fortinet Inc provides broad, integrated, and automated cybersecurity solutions to a variety of businesses, which is a high-demand sector in the current digital landscape. The company’s focus on network security, cloud security, and endpoint protection reflects the growing needs of businesses to secure their digital attack surfaces in a more interconnected environment.
